Package com.example.checkin

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.example.checkin.Database
public class Database extends Object
This class is for updating the other class objects to firebase Firebase Database: ... Guide for getting data from firebase: ... Another example: ... I also have some sample code at the bottom that should go onto an activity in order to retrieve the data

      public void uploadDeletedQR(String qrCodeID, String organizerID)

      Parameters:
      qrCodeID - the ID used to generate that qr code
      organizerID - the organizer ID of the organizer that created that QR code

    • getProfilePicture

      public UserImage getProfilePicture(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot doc)
      Function to retrieve the information of a profile picture stored in the database
      Parameters:
      doc - a successfully retrieved document from firebase
      Returns:
      a UserImage object containing the base64 string of the image and the user it belongs to

      public Map<String,String> retrieveDeletedQR(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot doc)
      For retrieving a deleted QR code
      Parameters:
      doc - a document snapshot from the Deleted QR code collection
      Returns:
      returns a map containing the deleted QR code and the associated organizer ID
